custom_pathway Enables creation of a custom pathway binary matrix from a binmat() `object`

Source: R/make-custom-pathway.R
custom_pathway.Rd

custom_pathway Enables creation of a custom pathway binary matrix from a binmat() `object`

custom_pathway(mat, pathway)

Arguments

mat

a binmat() binary matrix
pathway

a dataframe/tibble with first column the name of the genes, and second column their corresponding pathway

Value

pathway_dat : a binary matrix of pathway level alterations

Examples

library(gnomeR)
patients <- as.character(unique(mut$Tumor_Sample_Barcode))[1:200]
bin.mut <- binmat(patients = patients,maf = mut)
#> Warning: All samples were sequenced on the same platform.
#>               The spe.plat argument has been overwritten to FALSE.
pathway <- as.data.frame(cbind(c("PIK3CA","KRAS","TERT","TP53"),c("path1","path1","path2","path3")))
custom_pathway(mat = bin.mut, pathway = pathway)
#>                   path1 path2 path3
#> P-0000062-T01-IM3     0     0     1
#> P-0000065-T01-IM3     1     1     0
#> P-0000113-T01-IM3     0     0     1
